title: Archive Purge Configuration
content:

  • ››Manhattan Active® Omni
  • ››Store
  • ››Process & Configuration Guides
  • ››Store Inventory & Fulfillment
  • ››Store Order Fulfillment
  • ››Fulfillment Archive/Purge
  • ››Archive Purge Configuration

Archive/Purge Configuration

  • Store Fulfillment Parameters
  • Schedule Archive/Purge Job
  • UIs and Entities

Configuration is required to archive or purge Store Fulfillment.

Store Fulfillment Parameters

The following parameters must be configured to start archiving or purging of fulfillment:

Archive/Purge eligible fulfillment "X" days after completion

This parameter allows users to configure the number of days after which a completed or canceled fulfillment is archived or purged. For example, if the number of days is set to 30, then a fulfillment in "Shipped" or "Picked up" or "Canceled" status is archived/purged after 30 days from its completion. The fulfillment is archived or purged when the scheduler is run.

Select option to Archive or Purge fulfillment

This parameter is used to decide whether to archive or purge eligible fulfillment. Valid values are Archive, Purge or blank.

Schedule Archive/Purge Job

The job scheduler "archiveOrPurgeFulfillmentJob" is used to archive or purge eligible fulfillment after a defined time  A sample JSON to configure the job scheduler is shown below as a UI is not available. The scheduler must be configured if needed and saved. 

Post Message
{{url}}/fulfillment/api/batch/jobSchedule/save

{
    "IsDisabled": false,
    "IsAdHoc": false,
    "Process": null,
    "StartDelay": "1000",
    "TriggerKey": "archiveOrPurgeFulfillmentJobTrigger",
    "JobTypeId": "archiveOrPurgeFulfillmentJob",
    "CronExpression": "0 0 0 ? * *",
    "JobParameters": [
        {
            "InputValue": "1000",
            "InputKey": "ChunkSize"
        },
        {
            "InputValue": "200000",
            "InputKey": "ArchiveLimit"
        }
    ],
    "JobScheduleId": "archiveOrPurgeFulfillmentJob"
}

 

The frequency to run the scheduler can be configured by updating the CronExpression. 

UIs and Entities

The configuration UIs mentioned in this document is listed in the following table, along with information to navigate to the API documentation:

UI Name Component Group Seed Data Present? Seed Data Profile
Store Fulfillment Parameter Fulfillment FulfillmentParameters Services Yes Base
